name: Algerian University Process Simulator
short_description:
1st: Due to the pressing need for a simulator to those who are currently studying in field of industrial process/chemistry and oil/gas refinery/processing, in Algerian's universities.

2nd: Else due to the no availability of such software in hand for the vast majority of the students whose don't give big value to this subject (learning the simulation) and as consequence they get bad evaluation.

3rd: Else due to the "no existing of" convention made between Algerian's universities and those major leading software developers corporations in this field of simulation such as Auto-Desk & Aspen ...., to provide a teaching copy of  their programs, which could be very useful four the student.

So. I decided to open this open source project to tray to gather some developers to get start simulator project.
summary: gather some developers to get start simulator project
